None.Name: Nightfire
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, unit fires a blast of dark energy at enemies that deals 40 damage.

None.Name: Overload
None.Description: Activate to release a powerful shot after a preparation time of 6 seconds that deals 300 damage to enemies. Knocks back small units. Reusable every 20 seconds.
